first_aid_kit.name: First Aid Kit
first_aid_kit.effect: Contains 5 charges. As a standard action, you may use a charge on yourself or any Pokémon within melee range to do one of the following: restore 5 HP; cure a non-volatile status condition; stabilize a dying Pokémon.
first_aid_kit.desc: A small red pouch with a white non-copyrighted insignia on it. It can save lives if used properly.

iron_thorn.name: Iron Thorn
iron_thorn.effect: Inflicts {8+att} physical steel damage. If thrown, it deals double damage but breaks on impact.
iron_thorn.desc: A sharp metallic weapon for throwing.

oren_berry.name: Oren Berry
oren_berry.effect: If held, as a reaction, you may consume this item when taking damage that will bring your HP from above 20% to below 20% (even if you would be KO'd).\nDeals 2 typeless direct damage when consumed.

y_ray_specs.name: Y-Ray Specs
y_ray_specs.effect: While this is equipped, you are Blinded.
y_ray_specs.desc: A pair of very, very, VERY dark glasses.
